metadata.description: Citizen V is back -- literally! John Watkins III, rogue, scoundrel and adventurer returns as the lead covert operative of the paramilitary peace organization, the V-Battalion! And for his first adventure...how about the return of an assassin his grandmother killed decades earlier? How about civil war erupting in small volatile countries all over the world? And how about a sleeping giant?
metadata.name: Citizen V and the V-Battalion: the Everlasting
